Common package¶

Common utilities package, contains entities which may be used in both server and client parts of the messenger.

constants.py¶

class common.constants.JIM¶

Main JIM protocol json field list.

class Actions¶

Sublist of actions for ACTION field.

class UserData¶

Sublist of fields for a possible dict contained in a USER field.

class common.constants.ResCodes¶

Response numeric codes list.

class common.constants.Status¶

Status messages list.

decorators.py¶

class common.decorators.Log(raiseable=False)¶

Debug info logger class for tracing wrapped function calls.

common.decorators.login_required(func)¶

Decorator for checking that the client is authorized on the server.

Checks whether the socket object is within a client list, unless the auth procedure is running. Generates TypeError otherwise.

descriptors.py¶

class common.descriptors.IPAddress¶

Descriptor for valid server ip address.

class common.descriptors.PortNumber¶

Descriptor for valid server port numbers.

exceptions.py¶

exception common.exceptions.InvalidIPAddress(value)¶

Raised when trying to start a server on malformed ip address.

exception common.exceptions.NoAddressGivenError¶

Raised when no server host or address is passed to the client script.

exception common.exceptions.PortOutOfRangeError(port_number)¶

Raised when trying to set an incorrect port number through cli arguments.

exception common.exceptions.ServerError(err)¶

Raised when the server answers with ERROR message.

metaclasses.py¶

class common.metaclasses.ServerWatcher(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

A Metaclass for checking Server class implementation.

utils.py¶

common.utils.form_response(code=200)¶

Returns response object for the given code.

common.utils.parse_cli_flags(args_list)¶

Generic CLI arguments parser.

common.utils.receive_message(connection, logger)¶

Method for getting a message over a network connection.

common.utils.send_message(message_obj, connection, logger)¶

Method for sending a message over a network connection.
